meanings.definition: Canchas: plural of cancha, meaning a sports field or court
meanings.sent1: We played soccer on the canchas after school.
meanings.sent2: The basketball canchas were busy on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The canchas were so muddy after the rain, it was like playing in a swamp.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cancha of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The canchas echoed with the cheers of the fans.

meanings.definition: Canchas: third person singular present of the verb canchar, meaning to flirt or hit on someone
meanings.sent1: He canchas with everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always canchas with the customers at work.
meanings.sent3: The cat canchas with the mouse, trying to get its attention.
meanings.sent4: His words canchas around her like butterflies, making her blush.
meanings.sent5: The sun canchas with the clouds, playing hide and seek in the sky.
